content: this english only 22 page pdf crochet pattern has loads of pictures to show you how to crochet your very own ivysaur or bulbasaur pokemon difficulty ========== this pattern does not teach you how to crochet this is a great pattern for adventurous beginner to intermediate crocheters who are comfortable with sewing together many pieces at the end of the pattern you will have approximately a 5 inch tall pokemon depending on gauge terms and techniques us terms ================================ magic_ring/magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease half_double_crochet slip_stitch picot stitch working in continuous rounds invisible bind off/invisible finish basic sewing skills materials required ================== * aran/worsted weight size 4 yarn - recommended paintbox simply aran -for ivysaur - washed teal 232 spearmint green 225 and bubblegum pink 250 -for bulbasaur - washed teal 232 and lime green 228 * 3 0mm crochet hook * polyester fiberfill stuffing * stitch marker * small yarn/darning needle * scissors * felt in black red white and blue/turquoise * sewing needle with thread to match each felt colour * pins to hold pieces in place while sewing
